Characteristic.name: Alert Category ID

InformativeText.Summary: The value of the characteristic is an unsigned 8 bit integer that has a fixed point exponent of 0. The Alert Category ID characteristic defines the predefined categories of messages as an enumeration.

Enumeration.value: Simple Alert: General text alert or non-text alert
Email: Alert when Email messages arrives
News: News feeds such as RSS, Atom
Schedule: Alert occurred on calendar, planner
High Prioritized Alert: Alert that should be handled as high priority
Instant Message: Alert for incoming instant messages

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
